thread.title: Stocks Linked to a Chinese Energy Firm Sink on Fears of Clampdown

author: wsjcom
title: Stocks Linked to a Chinese Energy Firm Sink on Fears of Clampdown
text:
Shares and bonds of companies linked to a large Chinese energy and financial conglomerate plunged Thursday after a prominent local magazine said the conglomerate’s chairman had been questioned by Chinese authorities.
The report in Chinese magazine Caixin said Ye Jianming, the 40-year-old founder and chairman of CEFC China Energy Co., had been investigated recently but didn’t say which regulatory department had questioned him or what the reason was.
